ad_text: OTEK LLC Sponsored OTEK LLC from Grand Rapids, Michigan is Hiring Class A Drivers. Owned and Operated by a Truck Driver Himself. We're Growing and Need Experienced Class A Drivers to Join our Team! You Will Work Directly with the OWNER ONLY! We only run well Maintained equipment! Check out our DOT Inspection Ratings! Available Truck 2020 Freightliner Cascadia Automatic with Fridge, Invertor, APU / 2023 53' Dryvan. ✅ Staring pay is 0.60-0.70 ALL MILES DRIVEN- ODOMETER MILES ✅ We Haul Freight in the Midwest- South Regions. ✅ We keep you busy running 3000+ miles weekly. ✅100% No touch Dry Van Freight / Power Only. ✅Multiple Home time Options. ✅Trucks go 75mph ✅W-2 or 1099 options ✅Paid Every Friday via Direct Deposit No Escrow 🚫 Qualifications Must be at least 23 years or older.✅ Minimum of 12 months of experience.✅ Good MVR/ Good PSP ✅ Up to date Medical CARD.✅ Must Pass a Road Test✅ Signed up for clearinghouse.✅ Must be Safe, Reliable.✅ Good employment history✅ If interested please contact the Owner Directly Ahmed at 616-914-1177.( Text/Phone call is fine).
